text: Dietrich Mateschitz (20 May 1944 – 22 October 2022) was an Austrian billionaire businessman. He was the co-founder and 49% owner of the Red Bull energy drink company. In June 2019, Mateschitz's net worth was said to be at $19.5 billion, making him the 53rd richest person in the world. He was born in Sankt Marein im Mürztal, Styria. Mateschitz died on 22 October 2022 from a long-illness at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Austrian businesspeople Category:Billionaires
title: Dietrich Mateschitz
